name: Amidar
overview: Amidar is a clone of the GAKKEN tabletop version of the arcade classic Amidar, coded entirely in BASIC for the ZX Spectrum. It was developed and self-published by Salvador Camacho and released on February 26, 2022, originally as part of "Bytemaniacos Concurso BASIC 2022", a Spanish BASIC coding competition.
